column4: after reading the link that was provided to me and following the instructions i received this error... Error: your X configuration has been altered.
This script cannot proceed automatically. If you believe that this
not correct, you can update the md5sum entry executing the following
command:
md5sum /etc/X11/xorg.conf | sudo tee /var/lib/x11/xorg.conf.md5sum
otherwise edit manually /etc/X11/xorg.conf to change the Driver section
from nv to nvidia.
do the part after 'otherwise...'
. so that is normal i can proceed to the restart of X
well, did you make the change as it stated?
i followed the directions.. on the page it does not say that i will get an error after typing  sudo nvidia-glx-config enable
don't worry about that part, just open up /etc/X11/xorg.conf -- and then change "nv" to "nvidia", save the file, and restart X
gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf <-- type that at a console
hit alt+f2 -- in the window that pops up, type gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf -- and hit Run
when the file is open, scroll down to where you see Section "Device"
below that, you'll see Driver "nv" -- change nv to nvidia, so it reads Driver "nvidia"
then save the file, close everything, and hit ctrl+alt+backspace to restart your X server.
Thank you.. it worked perfectly..
good :) welcome to ubuntu.
double click on a torrent file
can i just open the torrent file from its location instead ?
did you read the wiki, and what do you mean by 'issue'

with mozilla for the flash it says i need to do a manuell install i downloaded the file and followed what it told me to do and still nothing i also used the synaptic package thing and still nothing.. and what wiki are you refering too
